options.name: position
options.purpose: CSS position property used on wrapper

options.name: colorBackground
options.purpose: Background color of the navbar wrapper

options.name: colorIcon
options.purpose: Background color of the navbar icon (Adam's classic circular cutout)

options.name: colorLink
options.purpose: Color of the navbar link before the route is active

options.name: colorLinkActive
options.purpose: Color of the navbar link when the route is active

options.name: navbarIcon
options.purpose: URL for the navbar icon image

options.name: navbarWidth
options.purpose: Width of the navbar when page is in desktop mode
